page.title: 09ANDERSONS BEY MUSEUM
page.content: Major George Anderson, a native of Rhynie Gordon, was in Highlanders and donated the weapons to Rhynie. Rhynie school opene a museum called Anderson Bey Museum. In it is a church bell, stones with little skeletons of ancient animals. There is also a collection of 7 native guns called firearms from the battlefields of Hafir Kerrari and Omdurman. There is also a Dervish straw headgear from the battlefield of Kerrari. There is also a khalifas flag, Dervish dagger, 6 spears and wooden bow and arrows in a black carrier, a malat, an iron tunic helmet, and an iron armour, an old plate for your leg with fancy patterns on it. There is a jumper kind of thing called a Jibha from the battle field of Aghara. There are five swords all together, from the battlefield of Tel-El-Kebir in 1882.
